TopicTitle: The ICBM mod from Mark James Space Co

Articles.Content:
Have enough RCS thrusters on their Captain Kalawang (jokingly said)?

There is no such thing as enough everything.
This can be made with mechjeb, you should adjust the landing speed. I dont know.
Which Minuteman model are you making Mark, the first one (LGM-30A or ?
im gonna make like a mix so its not absolutly unkerbal

im gonna make like a mix so its not absolutly unkerbal

Interesting idea, can't wait to see it.

Can Anyone Please Tell Me how to export a 3ds max file with all the materials to a .dae

im kinda new to max
file > export

file > export

it wont allow me to export with the materials that's the problem

Should be posted in Add on Development mate

for the ICBM "homing capability" maybe someone could write you a plugin that kind of works like mechjebs land at target feature, but only as fast as possible instead of a slow landing

Nice idea, Always wanted something like that, and generally would definitely get this ICBM mod, keep up the good work!

it wont allow me to export with the materials that's the problem

if someone can tell me I could finish this mod a lot quicker
this should be In the development thread

this should be In the development thread

That point has already been made, thanks.

I have some bad news in the .20 update mods will have to have a

different set up so iv heard so the my mod will come later then I expected sorry
Sorry if I'm being a little bitchy but shouldn't this go in the Development section?

you don't export with the materials, all that matters is that the UV map and normals are set correctly; you'll actually apply the material you want, in terms KSP understands, when you process the model through Unity into a .mu
I have the old w10 warhead part from almost the first icbm mod... anyone want me to post it?

I have the old w10 warhead part from almost the first icbm mod... anyone want me to post it?

I do that would be great
Its all good I accidently did this on purpose if you know what I mean

LOL - back in the mid 80's we used to have a sign on the Missile Control Center door that read "Trident-I Backfit, when you care enough to send the very best". (And t-shirts that read "16 empty missile tubes, 16 mushroom clouds, it's Miller time".)
Any more Work?

Any more Work?

sorry guys put all work has ceased and will be ceased intell summer school comes first sorry

That's ok, I have my ISS replica from the ISS pack and my Duna mission to do

And my F9H replica to build and launch
GOOD NEWS Schools Out And Work Will start back up again very soon
Neat, I'm still waitin for this.

I am having a CONTEST from June 21 tell July 1

WHAT YOU HAVE TO DO

Create a liquid engine

- Should Have Exhaust like a solid rocket

- Should Not Be A Stock Part

- Can Be Edited Off A Stock Part

- Should Have 4 Engine Nozzles

- And Should Be The Size Of The Mainsail Engine

I Am having this contest to finish this mod faster because I am stuck on the engine part.

THE WINNER WILL HAVE HIS NAME ON THE PART AND IN THE MOD.

Edited June 21, 2013 by Mark James
